It captures the essence of what makes rally unique like no other game – that sense of trying to remain in control of your emotions, as you hurtle along dangerous, undulating roads at breakneck speed, aiming to squeeze everything out of your car whilst knowing that one crash could irreparably harm your stage time. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eEvery stage tests you differently, as you race on the edge of control across varying surfaces in a range of environments such as snow, ice, tarmac and dirt and as you tackle a variety of weather types. As the car suffers attrition, you need to account for mechanical damage whilst your dedicated rally team tries to keep you competitive with time-limited repairs. Stages string together and each rally becomes a marathon-like test of concentration and skill as you trust in your co-driver, chasing that ever-elusive perfect run.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/6jJr-DMLka8\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eDiRT Rally also includes officially licensed World Rallycross content, allowing you to experience the breathless, high-speed thrills of some of the world’s fastest off-road cars as you trade paint with other drivers at some of the series best-loved circuits, in both singleplayer and high-intensity multiplayer races.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cimg alt=\\\"\\\" src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/fordfiesta_medium.png?11853052285803576779\\\" style=\\\"float: none;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/dirticon_compact.png?18254218700938060609\\\" alt=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/focusrs_medium.png?18145954231664149749\\\" alt=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eSIX MASSIVE RALLIES WITH OVER 70 STAGES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eWinding paths through forests, death defying drops off hillsides and narrow mountain paths are what this is all about, it’s you and your car versus the road ahead. Head to the muddy paths of Wales, the dusty trails of Greece and the icy tarmac of Monte Carlo. Take on the legendary hillclimb of Pikes Peak, the snowy thrills of Sweden, and the epic scenery of Finland. DiRT Rally has the iconic locations to test your nerve and delight your senses.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eOFFICIAL FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS CONTENT\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – \\u003cem\\u003eRace at the Lydden Hill, Holjes and Hell tracks in six of the fastest off-road cars and take on your friends in high intensity, bumper-to-bumper multiplayer racing.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eUPGRADES, REPAIRS, SETUP AND TUNING\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eDiRT Rally delivers depth in areas beyond driving – elements such as repairs, upgrades, and setup \\u0026amp; tuning add a rich and strategic dimension to your rally experience.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eCHALLENGING, UNCOMPROMISING HANDLING MODEL\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eTo take off-road racing to a level of realism not reached before, Codemasters has completely rebuilt the physical simulation for DIRT Rally. To adequately capture how it feels to race across changing surfaces, the Codemasters team has created brand new models for differential, suspension, engine mapping and turbo modelling. Codemasters has also modelled the way in which loose surfaces collect under the wheels during lateral sliding, creating a completely new feel to sliding around corners. This new physical simulation conveys the character of the compelling selection of cars as well as conveying the nuances of the game’s high fidelity racing surfaces.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eTEAM MANAGEMENT\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eHire and fire your crew members each of whom which will have different skills, improving repair times for different parts of the car. Teach them new skills as they gain experience and work together as a team to improve your performance in events.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eRACENET LEAGUE SUPPORT\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eGet together with friends and run your very own racing league. Join or create unlimited leagues and run them how and when you want.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eDAILY, WEEKLY AND MONTHLY RACENET CHALLENGES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e -\\u003cem\\u003e It’s you versus the entire DiRT community in a series of one-day, week-long and month-long challenges to earn in-game credits to improve your car and team.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/dirt-rally\\/12602\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003cstrong\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the game code which is used to download the game will be issue'd to you instantly via email. Codemasters and road tested over 60 million miles by the DiRT community, DiRT Rally is the ultimate rally experience. It captures the essence of what makes rally unique like no other game – that sense of trying to remain in control of your emotions, as you hurtle along dangerous, undulating roads at breakneck speed, aiming to squeeze everything out of your car whilst knowing that one crash could irreparably harm your stage time. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eEvery stage tests you differently, as you race on the edge of control across varying surfaces in a range of environments such as snow, ice, tarmac and dirt and as you tackle a variety of weather types. As the car suffers attrition, you need to account for mechanical damage whilst your dedicated rally team tries to keep you competitive with time-limited repairs. Stages string together and each rally becomes a marathon-like test of concentration and skill as you trust in your co-driver, chasing that ever-elusive perfect run.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/6jJr-DMLka8\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eDiRT Rally also includes officially licensed World Rallycross content, allowing you to experience the breathless, high-speed thrills of some of the world’s fastest off-road cars as you trade paint with other drivers at some of the series best-loved circuits, in both singleplayer and high-intensity multiplayer races.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cimg alt=\\\"\\\" src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/fordfiesta_medium.png?11853052285803576779\\\" style=\\\"float: none;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/dirticon_compact.png?18254218700938060609\\\" alt=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/focusrs_medium.png?18145954231664149749\\\" alt=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eSIX MASSIVE RALLIES WITH OVER 70 STAGES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eWinding paths through forests, death defying drops off hillsides and narrow mountain paths are what this is all about, it’s you and your car versus the road ahead. Head to the muddy paths of Wales, the dusty trails of Greece and the icy tarmac of Monte Carlo. Take on the legendary hillclimb of Pikes Peak, the snowy thrills of Sweden, and the epic scenery of Finland. DiRT Rally has the iconic locations to test your nerve and delight your senses.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eOFFICIAL FIA WORLD RALLYCROSS CONTENT\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – \\u003cem\\u003eRace at the Lydden Hill, Holjes and Hell tracks in six of the fastest off-road cars and take on your friends in high intensity, bumper-to-bumper multiplayer racing.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eUPGRADES, REPAIRS, SETUP AND TUNING\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eDiRT Rally delivers depth in areas beyond driving – elements such as repairs, upgrades, and setup \\u0026amp; tuning add a rich and strategic dimension to your rally experience.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eCHALLENGING, UNCOMPROMISING HANDLING MODEL\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eTo take off-road racing to a level of realism not reached before, Codemasters has completely rebuilt the physical simulation for DIRT Rally. To adequately capture how it feels to race across changing surfaces, the Codemasters team has created brand new models for differential, suspension, engine mapping and turbo modelling. Codemasters has also modelled the way in which loose surfaces collect under the wheels during lateral sliding, creating a completely new feel to sliding around corners. This new physical simulation conveys the character of the compelling selection of cars as well as conveying the nuances of the game’s high fidelity racing surfaces.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eTEAM MANAGEMENT\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eHire and fire your crew members each of whom which will have different skills, improving repair times for different parts of the car. Teach them new skills as they gain experience and work together as a team to improve your performance in events.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eRACENET LEAGUE SUPPORT\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - \\u003cem\\u003eGet together with friends and run your very own racing league. Join or create unlimited leagues and run them how and when you want.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e• \\u003cstrong\\u003eDAILY, WEEKLY AND MONTHLY RACENET CHALLENGES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e -\\u003cem\\u003e It’s you versus the entire DiRT community in a series of one-day, week-long and month-long challenges to earn in-game credits to improve your car and team.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/dirt-rally\\/12602\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003cstrong\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the game code which is used to download the game will be issue'd to you instantly via email. As “short range” specialists, their training is concentrated on indoor environments. Operating in tight formations, they are experts of close quarter combat, demolition, and coordinated assaults. Rainbow Six Siege will include operators coming from five of the most worldwide renowned CTU: the British SAS, the American SWAT, the French GIGN, the German GSG9 and the Russian SPETSNAZ. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eThese Operators are specialists with their own expertise within Siege operations. Each has their own unique personality \\u0026amp; specialty. Some are focused on assault where as others are defense-oriented. They can be combined within the same team to create new team strategies. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003ePROCEDURAL DESTRUCTION\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eDestruction is at the heart of the siege gameplay. Everything in the environment reacts realistically, dynamically, and uniquely based on the size and caliber of bullets you are using or the amount of explosives you have set. In Rainbow Six Siege, destruction is meaningful and mastering it is often the key to victory.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e###SPLIT###\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" Drop-in, drop-out Multiplayer and the addition of A.I. bots ensures a full team at any time, regardless of available players. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003ePlay as Five Unique Heroes -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Five distinct characters to choose from, each with their own personality, agenda and story to tell. Learning what it means to work together is key to the group's survival. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eHuge Hero Arsenal -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Each hero has its own unique weapons arsenal to draw from, allowing players to adjust their combat style to fit their gameplay preference. There are hundreds of different weapons, includíng swords, daggers, axes, hammers, bows, guns, magical staves \\u0026amp; more \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eEmbark on an Epic Quest -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Boasting 13 diverse levels - on the ground, in buildings, on walls and underground - ranging from the immense Magnus Tower to the treacherous Under Empire, Vermintide will take you on a journey you’ll never forget. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eExperience the Skaven Like Never Before -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e A rising tide of malicious and cunning rat-men await you, hacking, clawing and eviscerating all that stand in their way. Face vicious packs of clan-rats and deadly specialized elites. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eGather Mountains of Shiny Loot -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Rewarding teamwork above all else, players are given loot dice at the end of a mission that will reward them with a weapon, a hat or a trinket. Completing side objectives means that better loot dice can be added to the roll. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eBattle Unpredictable Enemies -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Vermintide features a dynamic spawn system providing a constant set of new challenges lurking behind every corner. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eExperience an Immersive Story -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Games Workshop veterans have banded together to write a fantastic new addition to the Warhammer lore, offering a new perspective on the cataclysmic events of The End Times. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eFind a Path to Safety -\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e The Skaven boast incredible mobility, able to climb and leap fantastic distances to make life a living hell for the Heroes. Developed exclusively for New-Gen platforms, Batman: Arkham Knight introduces Rocksteady's uniquely designed version of the Batmobile. The highly anticipated addition of this legendary vehicle, combined with the acclaimed gameplay of the Arkham series, offers gamers the ultimate and complete Batman experience as they tear through the streets and soar across the skyline of the entirety of Gotham City. In this explosive finale, Batman faces the ultimate threat against the city that he is sworn to protect, as Scarecrow returns to unite the super criminals of Gotham and destroy the Batman forever. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/CINA288fZUs\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003cstrong\\u003eKey Features: \\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e“Be The Batman”\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Live the complete Batman experience as the Dark Knight enters the concluding chapter of Rocksteady’s Arkham trilogy. Players will become The World’s Greatest Detective like never before with the introduction of the Batmobile and enhancements to signature features such as FreeFlow Combat, stealth, forensics and navigation. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eIntroducing the Batmobile\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – The Batmobile is brought to life with a completely new and original design featuring a distinct visual appearance and a full range of on-board high-tech gadgetry. Designed to be fully drivable throughout the game world and capable of transformation from high speed pursuit mode to military grade battle mode, this legendary vehicle sits at the heart of the game’s design and allows players to tear through the streets at incredible speeds in pursuit of Gotham City’s most dangerous villains. This iconic vehicle also augments Batman’s abilities in every respect, from navigation and forensics to combat and puzzle solving creating a genuine and seamless sense of the union of man and machine.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eThe Epic Conclusion to Rocksteady’s Arkham Trilogy\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Batman: Arkham Knight brings all-out war to Gotham City. The hit-and-run skirmishes of Batman: Arkham Asylum, which escalated into the devastating conspiracy against the inmates in Batman: Arkham City, culminates in the ultimate showdown for the future of Gotham. At the mercy of Scarecrow, the fate of the city hangs in the balance as he is joined by the Arkham Knight, a completely new and original character in the Batman universe, as well as a huge roster of other infamous villains including Harley Quinn, The Penguin, Two-Face and the Riddler. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eExplore the entirety of Gotham City\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – For the first time, players have the opportunity to explore all of Gotham City in a completely open and free-roaming game world. More than five times that of Batman: Arkham City, Gotham City has been brought to life with the same level of intimate, hand-crafted attention to detail for which the Arkham games are known. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eMost Wanted Side Missions\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Players can fully immerse themselves in the chaos that is erupting in the streets of Gotham. Encounters with high-profile criminal masterminds are guaranteed while also offering gamers the opportunity to focus on and takedown individual villains or pursue the core narrative path. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eNew Combat and Gadget Features\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Gamers have at their disposal more combat moves and high-tech gadgetry than ever before. The new ‘gadgets while gliding’ ability allows Batman to deploy gadgets such as batarangs, the grapnel gun or the line launcher mid-glide while Batman’s utility belt is once again upgraded to include all new gadgets that expand his range of forensic investigation, stealth incursion and combat skills.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/batman-arkham-knight-icon_large.png?4862612597191103345\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/batman-arkham-knight\\/12596\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003cstrong\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the CD Key will be issued to you via email with the game developer's url where you redeem the code we issue'd in the email to begin the download! The hit-and-run skirmishes of Batman: Arkham Asylum, which escalated into the devastating conspiracy against the inmates in Batman: Arkham City, culminates in the ultimate showdown for the future of Gotham. At the mercy of Scarecrow, the fate of the city hangs in the balance as he is joined by the Arkham Knight, a completely new and original character in the Batman universe, as well as a huge roster of other infamous villains including Harley Quinn, The Penguin, Two-Face and the Riddler. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eExplore the entirety of Gotham City\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – For the first time, players have the opportunity to explore all of Gotham City in a completely open and free-roaming game world. More than five times that of Batman: Arkham City, Gotham City has been brought to life with the same level of intimate, hand-crafted attention to detail for which the Arkham games are known. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eMost Wanted Side Missions\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Players can fully immerse themselves in the chaos that is erupting in the streets of Gotham. Thanks to that we gain experience and money so we can buy new weapons and develop our hero.\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e                                       \\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/77IR2fjgMBU\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eMAIN FEATURES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eBegin mayhem on the Moon\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – feel low gravity with every jump. When the nation is tearing itself apart, a young man runs his own investigation to reveal the truth. His searches lead him into the heart of competition to take over the country and make him a Master of Assassins.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eWe present Assassins Creed Unity, the true next-gen evolution of the key title that runs on Anvil engine. From the Bastille takeover to the execution of Louis XVI, you will experience the French Revolution like never before and help the people of France build a new future.\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e                                      \\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/xzCEdSKMkdU\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eKEY FEATURES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eUncompromising hero in a brutal world - You play as Arno, new assassin, crueler and even more dangerous than his ancestors. Hunt for your victims with completely new range of weapons, such us Invisible Blade and Hidden Blade connected with crossbow.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eAnvil Engine\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Unprecedented way of freedom in movement and character control. Players got full motion control of the character and new parkour techniques allow fluent passage through the buildings, walls and other obstacles. New fighting system brings better satisfaction from combat. The result of fight depends on skills, time feeling and fluency of moves. Off course, Arno will hide in the crowd and have abilities to control it. Stay hidden, hunt your victim and strike without any warning.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eParis\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Revolutionary Paris is shown like never before. Walk on stunning, full-size streets in an open world, created thanks to the abilities of Anvil engine. Discover fully detailed building's interiors, catacombs and sewer beneath the city. Follow the steps of your ancestors, find treasures, run criminal investigations and use the city in really unlimited way. Be a part of revolution chaos, get a crowd of even 5 000 characters controlled by computer.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eCooperation\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Besides a single player campaign, you can invite up to 3 friends in online mode and explore the city together. For the first time with three-years of development, the revered, award-winning studio has created its first title for next-gen hardware in the critically acclaimed Black Ops series. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eWelcome to Call of Duty: Black Ops 3, a dark, twisted future where a new breed of Black Ops soldier emerges and the lines are blurred between our own humanity and the technology we created to stay ahead, in a world where cutting-edge military robotics define warfare. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/58Pspqx0XGs\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eCall of Duty: Black Ops 3 combines three unique game modes: Campaign, Multiplayer and Zombies, providing fans with the deepest and most ambitious Call of Duty ever. The Campaign has been designed as a co-op game that can be played with up to 4 players online or as a solo cinematic thrill-ride. Multiplayer will be the franchise’s deepest, most rewarding and most engaging to date, with new ways to rank up, customize, and gear up for battle. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eAnd Zombies delivers an all-new mind-blowing experience with its own dedicated narrative. Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 can be played entirely online, and for the first time each of the offerings has its own unique player XP and progression systems. The title ushers in an unprecedented level of innovation, including jaw-dropping environments, never before experienced weaponry and abilities, and the introduction of a new, improved fluid movement system. All of this is brought to life by advanced technology custom crafted for this title, including new AI and animation systems, and graphics that redefine the standards Call of Duty fans have come to expect from the critically-acclaimed series, with cutting edge lighting systems and visual effects.\\u003cbr\\u003e                    \\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/call-of-duty-black-ops-player-3-psd-445435_compact.png?13786250733158727721\\\" alt=\\\"\\\" width=\\\"150\\\" height=\\\"207\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg alt=\\\"\\\" src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/codblop_medium.png?7245584185741864025\\\" style=\\\"float: none;\\\" width=\\\"216\\\" height=\\\"182\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/black_ops_ii_render_by_outlawninja-d5irus8_compact.png?14228850450332690712\\\" alt=\\\"\\\" width=\\\"209\\\" height=\\\"189\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eINTRODUCING A NEW ERA OF BLACK OPS:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eCall of Duty: Black Ops 3 deploys its players into a future where bio-technology has enabled a new breed of Black Ops soldier. Players are now always on and always connected to the intelligence grid and their fellow operatives during battle. In a world more divided than ever, this elite squad consists of men and women who have enhanced their combat capabilities to fight faster, stronger, and smarter. Every soldier has to make difficult decisions and visit dark places in this engaging, gritty narrative.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eA CALL OF DUTY CAMPAIGN UNLIKE ANYTHING BEFORE IT:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eTreyarch elevates the Call of Duty social gaming experience by delivering a campaign with the ability to play cooperatively with up to four players online, using the same battle-tested network infrastructure and social systems that support its world-class Multiplayer and Zombies game modes. Designed for co-op and re-playability, players encounter all the epic cinematic gameplay moments Call of Duty is known for delivering as well as new open-area arena-style gameplay elements designed to allow players to approach the game with a different strategy each time they play. And now, every player is completely customizable: from weapons and loadouts, to abilities and outfits, all with full progression systems and a personalized armory to show off accomplishments, providing a constantly-evolving campaign experience.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003ePREPARE FOR A LEVELED-UP MULTIPLAYER:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eWith Black Ops 3, Treyarch premieres a new momentum-based chained-movement system, allowing players to fluidly move through the environment with finesse, using controlled thrust jumps, slides, and mantling abilities in a multitude of combinations, all while maintaining complete control over your weapon at all times. Maps are designed from the ground-up for the new movement system, allowing players to be successful with traditional movement, as well as advanced tactics and maneuvers. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eBlack Ops 3 multiplayer also introduces the new Specialist character system, which allows players to rank up and master each specific character’s battle-hardened capabilities and weapons. With this addition to Traditional and Weapons XP progressions systems, Black Ops 3 multiplayer gives players three different ways to rank up.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eFIGHT THE UNDEAD IN AN ALL-NEW HORROR STORY:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eNo Treyarch title would be complete without its signature Zombies offering – a full-game experience with its own distinct storyline right out of the box. Black Ops 3 Zombies is the most immersive and ambitious Call of Duty Zombies to date, with a full XP-based progression system for players that adds depth and re-playability to the engaging gameplay Zombies fans have come to expect. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eCall of Duty: Black Ops 3 delivers the ultimate 3-games-in-1 experience.\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/cod3logo_medium.png?13475104272189627743\\\" alt=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/call-of-duty-black-ops-iii\\/12603\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003cstrong\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the game code which is used to download the game will be issue'd to you instantly via email. Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 can be played entirely online, and for the first time each of the offerings has its own unique player XP and progression systems. The title ushers in an unprecedented level of innovation, including jaw-dropping environments, never before experienced weaponry and abilities, and the introduction of a new, improved fluid movement system. All of this is brought to life by advanced technology custom crafted for this title, including new AI and animation systems, and graphics that redefine the standards Call of Duty fans have come to expect from the critically-acclaimed series, with cutting edge lighting systems and visual effects.\\u003cbr\\u003e                    \\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/call-of-duty-black-ops-player-3-psd-445435_compact.png?13786250733158727721\\\" alt=\\\"\\\" width=\\\"150\\\" height=\\\"207\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg alt=\\\"\\\" src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/codblop_medium.png?7245584185741864025\\\" style=\\\"float: none;\\\" width=\\\"216\\\" height=\\\"182\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/black_ops_ii_render_by_outlawninja-d5irus8_compact.png?14228850450332690712\\\" alt=\\\"\\\" width=\\\"209\\\" height=\\\"189\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eINTRODUCING A NEW ERA OF BLACK OPS:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eCall of Duty: Black Ops 3 deploys its players into a future where bio-technology has enabled a new breed of Black Ops soldier. In a world more divided than ever, this elite squad consists of men and women who have enhanced their combat capabilities to fight faster, stronger, and smarter. Every soldier has to make difficult decisions and visit dark places in this engaging, gritty narrative.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eA CALL OF DUTY CAMPAIGN UNLIKE ANYTHING BEFORE IT:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eTreyarch elevates the Call of Duty social gaming experience by delivering a campaign with the ability to play cooperatively with up to four players online, using the same battle-tested network infrastructure and social systems that support its world-class Multiplayer and Zombies game modes. Designed for co-op and re-playability, players encounter all the epic cinematic gameplay moments Call of Duty is known for delivering as well as new open-area arena-style gameplay elements designed to allow players to approach the game with a different strategy each time they play. And now, every player is completely customizable: from weapons and loadouts, to abilities and outfits, all with full progression systems and a personalized armory to show off accomplishments, providing a constantly-evolving campaign experience.\\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003ePREPARE FOR A LEVELED-UP MULTIPLAYER:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eWith Black Ops 3, Treyarch premieres a new momentum-based chained-movement system, allowing players to fluidly move through the environment with finesse, using controlled thrust jumps, slides, and mantling abilities in a multitude of combinations, all while maintaining complete control over your weapon at all times. Maps are designed from the ground-up for the new movement system, allowing players to be successful with traditional movement, as well as advanced tactics and maneuvers. \\u003c\\/em\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cem\\u003eBlack Ops 3 multiplayer also introduces the new Specialist character system, which allows players to rank up and master each specific character’s battle-hardened capabilities and weapons. His fight for glory has earned him the respect of legends like Blackbeard, but also drawn him into the ancient war between Assassins and Templars, a war that may destroy everything the pirates have built.\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eWelcome to the Golden Age of Piracy.\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/OwsotWkpSlU\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eKey Features\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eA BRASH REBEL ASSASSIN\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Become Edward Kenway, a charismatic yet brutal pirate captain, trained by Assassins. Edward can effortlessly switch between the Hidden Blade of the Assassin’s Order and all new weaponry including four flintlock pistols and dual cutlass swords.\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eEXPLORE AN OPEN WORLD FILLED WITH OPPORTUNITIES\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Discover the largest and most diverse Assassin’s Creed world ever created. From Kingston to Nassau, explore over 75 unique locations where you can live the life of a pirate including:\\u003cbr\\u003e- Loot underwater shipwrecks\\u003cbr\\u003e- Assassinate Templars in blossoming cities\\u003cbr\\u003e- Hunt for rare animals in untamed jungles\\u003cbr\\u003e- Search for treasure in lost ruins\\u003cbr\\u003e- Escape to hidden coves\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBECOME THE MOST FEARED PIRATE IN THE CARIBBEAN\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Command your ship, the Jackdaw, and strike fear in all who see her. Plunder and pillage to upgrade the Jackdaw with ammunition and equipment needed to fight off enemy ships. The ship’s improvements are critical to Edward’s progression through the game. Attack and seamlessly board massive galleons, recruit sailors to join your crew and embark on an epic and infamous adventure.\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eEXPERIENCE THE GRITTY REALITY BEHIND THE PIRATE FANTASY\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Stand amongst legendary names such as Blackbeard, Calico Jack and Benjamin Hornigold, as you establish a lawless Republic in the Bahamas and relive the truly explosive events that defined the Golden Age of Piracy.\\u003c\\/div\\u003e\\n\\u003cdiv style=\\\"text-align: left;\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eTHE BEST ASSASSIN’S CREED MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE TO DATE\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Put your assassination skills to test and embark on an online journey throughout the Caribbean. Games are adapted (mainly graphics) to the level of today’s hardware possibilities.\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eFirst game, Metro 2033, was originally released in 2010. Storyline is based upon a novel by Dimitrij Gluchowski. The action takes place in 2013, when the world what we know is doomed. Atomic apocalypse killed almost all humanity, leaving the surface as a toxic wasteland. A few survived and found shelter in Moscow underground, starting the new era of mankind – Darkness Era. You are Artem, a man raised in one of the metro stations in Moscow. You never left the borders of the station, but now you must go to the central and tell the message of a new danger.\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/9wuEpTDFtXU\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eAction of Metro: Last Night takes place a year after the first chapter. Rayman Origins brings back many of the classic characters, revived in their original 2D form, as well as a whole new world of characters and environments. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eFour-Player, Jump-In\\/Jump-Out, Co-op Gameplay:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Play as Rayman in the solo campaign, or have up to three friends jump in at any time to play as Globox or as one of the two Teensies. Players can leave at any time without affecting the others’ progression. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eUnique Approach to 2D Art:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e A rich world with over 100 characters and 12 unique environments created by some of the video gaming’s most reputed artists and animators. This creative approach to 2D design will recapture the hearts of platformer fans and introduce a new generation to one of the industry’s best-loved characters in his original 2D form. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eA Vast Playground:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Rayman Origins includes over 60 levels of 2D platforming gameplay designed for all ages and playing styles. Unlock new abilities progressively and return to previous levels to discover new paths and secrets. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eVariety of Gameplay:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Rayman Origins is a platformer at its core, but it has elements of many game genres. Rayman, Globox, and the Teensies gain unique abilities as they progress through the adventure, including swimming, diving and the sensational “HairlyCopter.” The game also features many elements of action, adventure, and beat-’em-up gameplay. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eEpic Boss Fights:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e A giant pink monster with hundreds of eyes... Together, the world’s most hilarious team of heroes will need to restore peace to the Glade, or watch as their beloved home vanishes like a bad dream...\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eKey Features\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cul\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eRebirth of a Platforming Legend:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e It’s been 15 years since the initial launch of Rayman. Rayman Origins brings back many of the classic characters, revived in their original 2D form, as well as a whole new world of characters and environments. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eFour-Player, Jump-In\\/Jump-Out, Co-op Gameplay:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Play as Rayman in the solo campaign, or have up to three friends jump in at any time to play as Globox or as one of the two Teensies. Players can leave at any time without affecting the others’ progression. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eUnique Approach to 2D Art:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e A rich world with over 100 characters and 12 unique environments created by some of the video gaming’s most reputed artists and animators. This creative approach to 2D design will recapture the hearts of platformer fans and introduce a new generation to one of the industry’s best-loved characters in his original 2D form. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eA Vast Playground:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Rayman Origins includes over 60 levels of 2D platforming gameplay designed for all ages and playing styles. Unlock new abilities progressively and return to previous levels to discover new paths and secrets. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eVariety of Gameplay:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Rayman Origins is a platformer at its core, but it has elements of many game genres. Rayman, Globox, and the Teensies gain unique abilities as they progress through the adventure, including swimming, diving and the sensational “HairlyCopter.” The game also features many elements of action, adventure, and beat-’em-up gameplay. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eEpic Boss Fights:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e A giant pink monster with hundreds of eyes... A possessed, mountainous golem... An evil daisy-cum-carnivorous plant...Rayman Origins will put players to the test with these and many more challenging boss battles! \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eA Handful of Highly Talented Artists and Engineers:\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e Rayman Origins was developed by the UBIart team in Montpellier and is built on an open-source game engine - the UBIart Framework - designed by Michel Ancel to allow much smaller teams of artists and developers to produce incredibly high-quality graphics and gameplay quickly and efficiently. This garage-game approach has led to great strides in creativity and innovation.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/ul\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/rayman-origins\\/11271\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003cstrong\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the CD Key will be issued to you via email with the game developer's url where you redeem the code we issue'd in the email to begin the download! More details on this can be found on our FAQ page.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\"},{\"id\":519811075,\"title\":\"Space Engineers\",\"handle\":\"space-engineers\",\"description\":\"\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: right;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/icon-worldwide-256_thumb.png?2644095443657205387\\\" width=\\\"55\\\" height=\\\"55\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/newsteam_thumb.jpg?2644095443657205387\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/space-engineers_1024x1024.jpg?12858341088177844703\\\" width=\\\"759\\\" height=\\\"286\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eSpace Engineers is a sandbox game about engineering, construction and maintenance of space works. Players build space ships and space stations of various sizes and utilization (civil and military), pilot ships and perform asteroid mining.\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eSpace Engineers utilizes a realistic volumetric-based physics engine: all objects can be assembled, disassembled, damaged and destroyed. The game comes with two game modes: creative and survival. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/zAYnGkSqTwg\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eVolumetric objects are structures composed from block-like modules interlocked in a grid. Volumetric objects behave like real physical objects with mass, inertia and velocity. Individual modules have real volume and storage capacity. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eSpace Engineers is inspired by reality and by how things work. Think about modern-day NASA technology extrapolated 60 years into the future. Space Engineers strives to follow the laws of physics and doesn't use technologies that wouldn't be feasible in the near future. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eSpace Engineers concentrates on construction aspects, but can be played as a tactical shooter as well. We expect players to avoid engaging in direct man-to-man combat and instead use their creativity and engineering skills to build war machines and fortifications. Space Engineers shouldn’t be about troops; it should be about the machinery you build.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"text-decoration: underline;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eKey Features\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cul class=\\\"bb_ul\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eGame modes\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e- Creative – unlimited resources, instant building, no death \\u003cbr\\u003e- Survival – realistic management of resources and inventory capacity; manual building; death and respawn\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSingle-player\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – you are the sole space engineer\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eMultiplayer\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - alpha version (not a final version) \\u003cbr\\u003e- Creative and survival mode with your friends \\u003cbr\\u003e- Cooperative and competitive \\u003cbr\\u003e- Privacy customization: offline, private, friends only, public \\u003cbr\\u003e- Max 16 players (this may increase in the future) \\u003cbr\\u003e- Weapons on\\/off \\u003cbr\\u003e- Copy-paste on\\/off\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eScenarios\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e- Easy Start 1 – start on an asteroid platform with one large ship and two small ships \\u003cbr\\u003e- Easy Start 2 – start in a green asteroid station with several large and small ships (this is a large scene!) \\u003cbr\\u003e- Lone Survivor – start on an abandoned asteroid platform with no ships \\u003cbr\\u003e- Crashed Red Ship – your mother ship just crashed... \\u003cbr\\u003e- Two Platforms – competitive two-team multi-player world \\u003cbr\\u003e- Asteroids – start in a rescue ship with very limited resources \\u003cbr\\u003e- Empty World – no asteroids, no ships; suitable for creative mode\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eDedicated servers\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - allow players to connect to a third party host, rather than using a player-host, in a peer-to-peer set-up. The result is a faster connection and a more fluent multiplayer performance with less lag\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eShips (small and large ships\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – build them, pilot them and crush them\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eSpace stations\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eFirst-person \\u0026amp; Third-person\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSuper-large worlds\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – the size of the world to 1,000,000,000 km in diameter (almost infinite)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eProcedural asteroids\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - adds an infinite number of asteroids to the game world\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eExploration\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - adds an infinite number of ships and stations to the game world; discover, explore, acquire and conquer!\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eDrilling \\/ harvesting\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eManual building in survival mode\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – use welder to assemble blocks from components; use grinder to disassemble and reuse components\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eDeformable and destructible objects\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – real proportions, mass, storage capacity, integrity\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBuilding blocks\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - light armor (cube, slope, corner), heavy armor, interior wall, interior light, small cockpit, large cockpit, cargo container(s), drill (character, large\\/small ship), ore detector, gravity generator, nuclear reactor, thruster, gyroscope, assembler, medical room, magnetic landing gears, spotlight, catwalk, cover wall, stairs, ramp, window(s), pillar, decoy, wheels, automated turrets, weapons, artificial mass, conveyor, collector, connector, merge block, camera, sensor, timer, text panel\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eMagnetic landing gears\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – attach your ship to a surface (another ship or asteroid)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eElectricity\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - all blocks in a grid are wired in an electrical and computer network; electricity is generated by nuclear reactors\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eGravity\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – produced by gravity generators. Spherical gravity generator also available.\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRotors\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – create rotating objects\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eAdvanced rotors\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – able to function as a conveyor system\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRefinery\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - process harvested ore to ingots\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eAssembler\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - manufacture components from ingots\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eOxygen\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - take off character's helmet, generate oxygen out of ice by using the oxygen generator\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSymmetry\\/Mirroring Mode\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - useful in creative mode when building structures that require symmetry\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eWeapons\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - automatic rifle, small and large explosive warheads, small ship gatling gun, small ship missile launcher\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSolar panels\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - produce energy depending on the amount of light that they catch from the sun\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eWorld management\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – generate new worlds, “save as” to multiple copies, auto-save every 5 minutes (can be turned on\\/off), edit world settings\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003e32-bit \\u0026amp; 64-bit\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - 64-bit version expands the amount of objects, ships and asteroids (almost unlimited)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSteam Workshop \\u003c\\/strong\\u003e- Share your creations with the Community (upload and download worlds)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eModding\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - world files, shaders, textures, 3D models\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eLocalized interface (WIP)\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Czech, Danish, Dutch, German, Icelandic, Polish, Spanish-Spain, Spanish-Latin America, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Italian, Portuguese-Brazil, Estonian, Norwegian, Swedish, Slovak, Ukrainian, Russian\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eCustom colors for blocks\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Customize your creations by using any color you like\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eCargo ships\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - auto-piloted vessels (miners, freighters and military) that carry ore, ingots, constructions components and other materials from sector to sector. They can be looted but beware, they often contain booby traps!\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eEnvironmental hazards\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – protect your character and your creations from meteor storms (Safe, Normal, Cataclysm, Armageddon)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eConveyor, Collector, Connector (IMPORTANT: this is a first work-in-progress version and a realistic version will be added later)\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Conveyors move items from inventory to inventory. Collectors can collect small objects (ore, ingots, components, tools) into inventory. Connectors can throw items from inventory to space (in future update could be used to connect two ships\\/stations and transfer items)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eArtificial mass\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – can be used to add gravity-affected mass to ships, useful in machine ships or cars\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eWheels\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - use them with rotors and artificial mass to build vehicles\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eAutomated turrets\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – gatling, missile and interior. Turrets are used mostly as defense mechanism rather than shooting other players. They aim on decoys (automatically by default), meteorites, missiles or all moving objects (eg. small\\/large ships) - targeting can be changed in the control panel\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eLarge weapons\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - missile launcher (for large ships)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eLarge and small ship grinder and welder\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – assemble and disassemble blocks faster and in larger amount\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBatteries\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - enables players to store the energy generated by solar panels or reactors at an efficiency rate of 80%\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003ePistons\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - offers the option to build more advanced machinery\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eFactions\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - create and join factions, determine ownership of blocks and manage the relations between them (hostile\\/ally). \\u003ci\\u003eNOTE: Factions are currently Work-in-Progress. There are still many things to be added (eg. chat and communication) and some bugs\\/issues are yet to be fixed.\\u003c\\/i\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRemote ship control\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – control ships without being inside the ship’s cockpit (drones)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRemote turret control\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - control turrets directly\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003e3D printing\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - export (CTRL+ALT+E) and 3D print the creations that you design in the game ( \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/3d-printing.html\\\"\\u003ehttp:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/3d-printing.html\\u003c\\/a\\u003e )\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong style=\\\"line-height: 1.5;\\\"\\u003eModding API\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.5;\\\"\\u003e - brings a lot of new possibilities to modders and allows them to alter the game by writing C# scripts which have access to in-game objects \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003ci style=\\\"line-height: 1.5;\\\"\\u003e(WIP - more features will be added in the future)\\u003c\\/i\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBlueprints\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - save your ship or station on a blueprint and paste it into your game\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eProjector block\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – project blueprints and weld the projection\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSensor\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – detects ships, palyers, asteroids, stations, floating objects and their state (friendly, neutral or enemy) and ownership\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSound block\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - reproduce predefined sounds such as alarm or siren for announcements\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eProgrammable block\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – players can write small programs executed by the block\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eCommunication\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – chat between players and factions\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eGPS\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - create, send, receive and manage GPS coordinates in the game\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eVoxel hands\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - shape and form the asteroids and change their material (creative mode only)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/ul\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003ePlease be sure to read the list of \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/features.html%20\\\" target=\\\"_blank\\\" title=\\\"Space Engineers\\\"\\u003ecurrent features\\u003c\\/a\\u003e before you buy the game. It will give you an insight on what is or isn't actually working.\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong style=\\\"text-decoration: underline; line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003eHow to Play\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eStart by watching this video tutorial: \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/how-to-play.html\\\"\\u003ehttp:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/how-to-play.html\\u003c\\/a\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003ePerformance Notes\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eSpace Engineers is in development and undergoing frequent optimizations. The performance will get better. \\u003cbr\\u003eThe performance depends on the complexity of your world and the configuration of your computer. Simple worlds run smoothly even on low-end computers, but a more complex world with rich object interactions could overload even high-end computers. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003ePlease read our performance advices \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/performance-advices.html\\\" target=\\\"_blank\\\" title=\\\"Space Engineers\\\"\\u003ehere\\u003c\\/a\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eMinimum requirements represent the bare minimum to run simple scenes and don’t guarantee a perfect experience.\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/space_engineers___icon_by_blagoicons-d739g5e_large.png?3370160999521878639\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/space-engineers\\/11880\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cstrong style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the CD Key will be issued to you via email with the game developer's url where you redeem the code we issue'd in the email to begin the download!
