src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/space-engineers_1024x1024.jpg?12858341088177844703\\\" width=\\\"759\\\" height=\\\"286\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eSpace Engineers is a sandbox game about engineering, construction and maintenance of space works. Players build space ships and space stations of various sizes and utilization (civil and military), pilot ships and perform asteroid mining.\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eSpace Engineers utilizes a realistic volumetric-based physics engine: all objects can be assembled, disassembled, damaged and destroyed. The game comes with two game modes: creative and survival. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003ciframe width=\\\"560\\\" height=\\\"315\\\" src=\\\"https:\\/\\/www.youtube.com\\/embed\\/zAYnGkSqTwg\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allowfullscreen=\\\"\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/iframe\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eVolumetric objects are structures composed from block-like modules interlocked in a grid. Volumetric objects behave like real physical objects with mass, inertia and velocity. Individual modules have real volume and storage capacity. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eSpace Engineers is inspired by reality and by how things work. Think about modern-day NASA technology extrapolated 60 years into the future. Space Engineers strives to follow the laws of physics and doesn't use technologies that wouldn't be feasible in the near future. \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003eSpace Engineers concentrates on construction aspects, but can be played as a tactical shooter as well. We expect players to avoid engaging in direct man-to-man combat and instead use their creativity and engineering skills to build war machines and fortifications. Space Engineers shouldn’t be about troops; it should be about the machinery you build.\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"text-decoration: underline;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eKey Features\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cul class=\\\"bb_ul\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eGame modes\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e- Creative – unlimited resources, instant building, no death \\u003cbr\\u003e- Survival – realistic management of resources and inventory capacity; manual building; death and respawn\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSingle-player\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – you are the sole space engineer\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eMultiplayer\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - alpha version (not a final version) \\u003cbr\\u003e- Creative and survival mode with your friends \\u003cbr\\u003e- Cooperative and competitive \\u003cbr\\u003e- Privacy customization: offline, private, friends only, public \\u003cbr\\u003e- Max 16 players (this may increase in the future) \\u003cbr\\u003e- Weapons on\\/off \\u003cbr\\u003e- Copy-paste on\\/off\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eScenarios\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e \\u003cbr\\u003e- Easy Start 1 – start on an asteroid platform with one large ship and two small ships \\u003cbr\\u003e- Easy Start 2 – start in a green asteroid station with several large and small ships (this is a large scene!) \\u003cbr\\u003e- Lone Survivor – start on an abandoned asteroid platform with no ships \\u003cbr\\u003e- Crashed Red Ship – your mother ship just crashed... \\u003cbr\\u003e- Two Platforms – competitive two-team multi-player world \\u003cbr\\u003e- Asteroids – start in a rescue ship with very limited resources \\u003cbr\\u003e- Empty World – no asteroids, no ships; suitable for creative mode\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eDedicated servers\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - allow players to connect to a third party host, rather than using a player-host, in a peer-to-peer set-up. The result is a faster connection and a more fluent multiplayer performance with less lag\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eShips (small and large ships\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – build them, pilot them and crush them\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eSpace stations\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eFirst-person \\u0026amp; Third-person\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSuper-large worlds\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – the size of the world to 1,000,000,000 km in diameter (almost infinite)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eProcedural asteroids\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - adds an infinite number of asteroids to the game world\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eExploration\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - adds an infinite number of ships and stations to the game world; discover, explore, acquire and conquer!\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\u003cstrong\\u003eDrilling \\/ harvesting\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eManual building in survival mode\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – use welder to assemble blocks from components; use grinder to disassemble and reuse components\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eDeformable and destructible objects\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – real proportions, mass, storage capacity, integrity\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBuilding blocks\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - light armor (cube, slope, corner), heavy armor, interior wall, interior light, small cockpit, large cockpit, cargo container(s), drill (character, large\\/small ship), ore detector, gravity generator, nuclear reactor, thruster, gyroscope, assembler, medical room, magnetic landing gears, spotlight, catwalk, cover wall, stairs, ramp, window(s), pillar, decoy, wheels, automated turrets, weapons, artificial mass, conveyor, collector, connector, merge block, camera, sensor, timer, text panel\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eMagnetic landing gears\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – attach your ship to a surface (another ship or asteroid)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eElectricity\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - all blocks in a grid are wired in an electrical and computer network; electricity is generated by nuclear reactors\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eGravity\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – produced by gravity generators. Spherical gravity generator also available.\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRotors\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – create rotating objects\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eAdvanced rotors\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – able to function as a conveyor system\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRefinery\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - process harvested ore to ingots\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eAssembler\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - manufacture components from ingots\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eOxygen\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - take off character's helmet, generate oxygen out of ice by using the oxygen generator\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSymmetry\\/Mirroring Mode\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - useful in creative mode when building structures that require symmetry\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eWeapons\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - automatic rifle, small and large explosive warheads, small ship gatling gun, small ship missile launcher\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSolar panels\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - produce energy depending on the amount of light that they catch from the sun\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eWorld management\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – generate new worlds, “save as” to multiple copies, auto-save every 5 minutes (can be turned on\\/off), edit world settings\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003e32-bit \\u0026amp; 64-bit\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - 64-bit version expands the amount of objects, ships and asteroids (almost unlimited)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSteam Workshop \\u003c\\/strong\\u003e- Share your creations with the Community (upload and download worlds)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eModding\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - world files, shaders, textures, 3D models\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eLocalized interface (WIP)\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Czech, Danish, Dutch, German, Icelandic, Polish, Spanish-Spain, Spanish-Latin America, Finnish, French, Hungarian, Italian, Portuguese-Brazil, Estonian, Norwegian, Swedish, Slovak, Ukrainian, Russian\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eCustom colors for blocks\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – Customize your creations by using any color you like\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eCargo ships\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - auto-piloted vessels (miners, freighters and military) that carry ore, ingots, constructions components and other materials from sector to sector. They can be looted but beware, they often contain booby traps!\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eEnvironmental hazards\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – protect your character and your creations from meteor storms (Safe, Normal, Cataclysm, Armageddon)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eConveyor, Collector, Connector (IMPORTANT: this is a first work-in-progress version and a realistic version will be added later)\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - Conveyors move items from inventory to inventory. Collectors can collect small objects (ore, ingots, components, tools) into inventory. Connectors can throw items from inventory to space (in future update could be used to connect two ships\\/stations and transfer items)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eArtificial mass\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – can be used to add gravity-affected mass to ships, useful in machine ships or cars\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eWheels\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - use them with rotors and artificial mass to build vehicles\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eAutomated turrets\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – gatling, missile and interior. Turrets are used mostly as defense mechanism rather than shooting other players. They aim on decoys (automatically by default), meteorites, missiles or all moving objects (eg. small\\/large ships) - targeting can be changed in the control panel\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eLarge weapons\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - missile launcher (for large ships)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eLarge and small ship grinder and welder\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – assemble and disassemble blocks faster and in larger amount\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBatteries\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - enables players to store the energy generated by solar panels or reactors at an efficiency rate of 80%\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003ePistons\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - offers the option to build more advanced machinery\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eFactions\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - create and join factions, determine ownership of blocks and manage the relations between them (hostile\\/ally). \\u003ci\\u003eNOTE: Factions are currently Work-in-Progress. There are still many things to be added (eg. chat and communication) and some bugs\\/issues are yet to be fixed.\\u003c\\/i\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRemote ship control\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – control ships without being inside the ship’s cockpit (drones)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eRemote turret control\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - control turrets directly\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003e3D printing\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - export (CTRL+ALT+E) and 3D print the creations that you design in the game ( \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/3d-printing.html\\\"\\u003ehttp:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/3d-printing.html\\u003c\\/a\\u003e )\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong style=\\\"line-height: 1.5;\\\"\\u003eModding API\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.5;\\\"\\u003e - brings a lot of new possibilities to modders and allows them to alter the game by writing C# scripts which have access to in-game objects \\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003ci style=\\\"line-height: 1.5;\\\"\\u003e(WIP - more features will be added in the future)\\u003c\\/i\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eBlueprints\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - save your ship or station on a blueprint and paste it into your game\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eProjector block\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – project blueprints and weld the projection\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSensor\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – detects ships, palyers, asteroids, stations, floating objects and their state (friendly, neutral or enemy) and ownership\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eSound block\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - reproduce predefined sounds such as alarm or siren for announcements\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eProgrammable block\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – players can write small programs executed by the block\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eCommunication\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e – chat between players and factions\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eGPS\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - create, send, receive and manage GPS coordinates in the game\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003cli\\u003e\\n\\u003cstrong\\u003eVoxel hands\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e - shape and form the asteroids and change their material (creative mode only)\\u003c\\/li\\u003e\\n\\u003c\\/ul\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003ePlease be sure to read the list of \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/features.html%20\\\" target=\\\"_blank\\\" title=\\\"Space Engineers\\\"\\u003ecurrent features\\u003c\\/a\\u003e before you buy the game. It will give you an insight on what is or isn't actually working.\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong style=\\\"text-decoration: underline; line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003eHow to Play\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eStart by watching this video tutorial: \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/how-to-play.html\\\"\\u003ehttp:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/how-to-play.html\\u003c\\/a\\u003e \\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cstrong style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003ePerformance Notes\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cmeta charset=\\\"utf-8\\\"\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eSpace Engineers is in development and undergoing frequent optimizations. The performance will get better. \\u003cbr\\u003eThe performance depends on the complexity of your world and the configuration of your computer. Simple worlds run smoothly even on low-end computers, but a more complex world with rich object interactions could overload even high-end computers. \\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003ePlease read our performance advices \\u003ca href=\\\"http:\\/\\/www.spaceengineersgame.com\\/performance-advices.html\\\" target=\\\"_blank\\\" title=\\\"Space Engineers\\\"\\u003ehere\\u003c\\/a\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003e\\u003cbr\\u003eMinimum requirements represent the bare minimum to run simple scenes and don’t guarantee a perfect experience.\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp style=\\\"text-align: center;\\\"\\u003e\\u003cimg src=\\\"\\/\\/cdn.shopify.com\\/s\\/files\\/1\\/0567\\/5049\\/files\\/space_engineers___icon_by_blagoicons-d739g5e_large.png?3370160999521878639\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e####http:\\/\\/www.systemrequirementslab.com\\/cyri\\/requirements\\/space-engineers\\/11880\\/?p=r\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e####\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003cstrong style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003eDelivery Details\\u003c\\/strong\\u003e\\u003cspan style=\\\"line-height: 1.4;\\\"\\u003e\\u003c\\/span\\u003e\\u003c\\/p\\u003e\\n\\u003cp\\u003eUpon payment and verification that your order is genuine, the CD Key will be issued to you via email with the game developer's url where you redeem the code we issue'd in the email to begin the download! sa = document.createElement('script'); sa.type = 'text/javascript'; sa.async = true;\n      sa.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? bottom: 0; right: 0;\">\n    <a href=\"//www.digizani.com/pages/contact\"><img src=\"https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0567/5049/files/contactustab.png?4191948447649472298\"></a>\n  </div>\n\n  <!-- start BKPlatform -->\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n\n\n// Fast way to parsing query strings\nvar BKInjectUrlParams = function() {\n    // Remove certain param from url\n    function removeParam(key, sourceURL) {\n        var rtn = sourceURL.split(\"?\")[0],\n                param,\n                params_arr = [],\n                queryString = (sourceURL.indexOf(\"?\") !== -1) ? sourceURL.split(\"?\")[1] : \"\";\n        if (queryString !== \"\") {\n            params_arr = queryString.split(\"&\");\n            for (var i = params_arr.length - 1; i >= 0; i -= 1) {\n                param = params_arr[i].split(\"=\")[0];\n                if (param === key) {\n                    params_arr.splice(i, 1);\n                }\n            }\n            rtn = rtn + \"?\" + params_arr.join(\"&\");\n        }\n        return rtn;\n    }\n\n    // Try to detect a contact visit store url by anon\n    var trackingParams = null,\n        query = window.location.search.substring(1),\n        vars = query.split('&'), i,\n        keyName = 'bkp';\n\n    for (i = 0; i < vars.length; i++) {\n        var pair = vars[i].split('=');\n        var key = decodeURIComponent(pair[0]);\n\n        if (key == keyName || key == 'bk_et') {\n            try {\n                if (key == 'bk_et') {\n                    // -> Bas64 -> Json decode\n                    trackingParams = JSON.parse(atob(decodeURIComponent(pair[1])));\n                } else {\n                    trackingParams = {\n                        email_id: null,\n                        contact_track_type: '',\n                        contact_ref_id: '',\n                        campaign_type: '',\n                        campaign_id: null\n                    };\n                    var draftTrackingParams = decodeURIComponent(pair[1]);\n                    draftTrackingParams = draftTrackingParams.split(';');\n                    for (var j = 0; j < draftTrackingParams.length; j++) {\n                        var param = draftTrackingParams[j].split(':');\n                        switch (param[0]) {\n                            case 'e':\n                                trackingParams.email_id = param[1];\n                                break;\n\n                            case 'ctt':\n                                trackingParams.contact_track_type = param[1];\n                                break;\n\n                            case 'cri':\n                                trackingParams.contact_ref_id = param[1];\n                                break;\n\n                            case 'ct':\n                                trackingParams.campaign_type = param[1];\n                                break;\n\n                            case 'cid':\n                                trackingParams.campaign_id = param[1];\n                                break;\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n\n                // Remove tracking param from url\n                if (trackingParams && window.history && typeof window.history.pushState == 'function') {\n                    var urlAfterRemove = removeParam(key, window.location.href);\n                    window.history.pushState('', '', urlAfterRemove);\n                }\n            } catch (e) {\n                // Could not parse query\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    // Return tracking params\n    return trackingParams;\n}();\n\n(function (doc, scriptPath) {\n    var sc, node, today=new Date(),dd=today.getDate(),mm=today.getMonth()+1,yyyy=today.getFullYear();if(dd<10)dd='0'+dd;if(mm<10)mm='0'+mm;today=yyyy+mm+dd;\n    // Load base script tag\n    sc = doc.createElement(\"script\");\n    sc.type = \"text/javascript\";\n    sc.async = !0;\n    sc.src = scriptPath + '?' + today;\n    node = doc.getElementsByTagName(\"script\")[0];\n    node.parentNode.insertBefore(sc, node);\n})(document, 'https://cdn.beeketing.com/dist/js/front/loader/shopify.js');\n</script>\n<!-- end BKPlatform -->\n  <script
